Quickstrike:



Taking watch was just as bad as lugging around supplies. Maybe even 
worse. He looked around, arching his neck left and right, taking at 
glance at the others.

After of few more mintures of leaning against the side of the ramp 
wall, he saw something in the sky. It looked like a flier. He snapped 
up and watched it. His optics were the keenest part of his senses.

It got closer.

"Hey!" he called to alert the others. He trotted down to the end of 
the ramp and stood in attention to the approaching flier. It has 
wings, red in color.

He aimed his arm up at it, ready to fire, then he realized what it 
was.

"Dang." He lowered his arm. It was Terrorsaur. He dactyl landed by 
him. "Where in tarnation were you?"

"Spying," the dactyl replied. His wings shook a little.

"Spying, huh?" He turned his head towards the others.
